questionText: What is the primary function of an operating system (OS)?
choice1: To manage computer hardware and software resources

questionText: Which of the following is a dynamically-typed language?
What is the purpose of an index in a database?
choice1: To speed up the performance of queries

questionText: In the context of REST APIs, what does "idempotent" mean?
choice0: An operation that is very fast
choice1: An operation that returns a unique ID
choice2: An operation that has the same result whether it is executed once or multiple times
choice3: An operation that can only be performed by an administrator
